title: Beer Mile On Tap In Texas
teaser: Two-time Olympian Nick Symmonds will compete in the Beer Mile World Championships in Austin today.
contentencoded:
Nick Symmonds has run in two Olympics, where no performance-enhancing drugs are allowed. Tonight, consuming a foreign substance will be required to compete. It’s the Beer Mile World Championships in Austin, Texas. Contestants drink four beers over the course of a mile and see who can do it fastest.

Guest

  • Nick Symmonds, Olympic runner. He tweets @NickSymmonds.
